titles.title: I will stand in the congregation

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will stand in the congregation
and I will exalt You.
I will stand in the congregation
and I will exalt You.
Let the children of Your salvation
lift their praises, too.
Hallelujah!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I will stand in the congregation
and I will praise Your name.
I will stand in the congregation
and I will praise Your name.
With Your people in every nation
I will shout this praise:
Hallelujah!

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Hallelujah, hallelujah,
hallelujah, hallelujah!
You're the only inspiration
for my praise, o, God.
Hallelujah, hallelujah,
hallelujah, hallelujah!
